dct_title_s: ZEE TOGTEN door THOMAS CANDYS na de WEST INDIEN; en van daar rondom den gantzen AARD KLOOT gedaan
dct_description_sm: Issued in his: Naaukeurige versameling der gedenk-waardigste zee … . – Leide, 1707.
[1707], with Pag. 1. (top right). Issued in his: Cartes des itineraires & voiages modernes … . – A Leide, [1707].
[1714], with ornamental border. French title added to Dutch title. Issued in his: Atlas nouveau et curieux des plus celebres itineraires … . – a Leide, [1714]. Reissued in 1728.

California with a relatively flat top on the island. C. Mendocino, C. de Pinos, Porto Seguro, and C. St. Lucar labeled. The path of Thomas Candys (Cavendish) is shown. Title on a carved stone. Vignette to the right shows the preparation and serving of a meal. Vytgevoerd te Leyden door PIETER VANDER Aa met Privilegie. (bottom left). Thomas Candisch. (Cavendish) (bottom right). Two scales (Germanic and Gallic) shown at bottom left.
